alert.note: Alert for Cascade Foothills in Lane County; Cascades in Lane County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 24 at 7:57PM PDT by NWS Portland
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTH CENTRAL LANE COUNTY THROUGH 830 PM PDT... At 757 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hills Creek Reservoir, or near Oakridge, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. Hail up to the size of pennies. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Oakridge, Lowell, Hills Creek Reservoir, Lookout Point Reservoir, Westfir, Fall Creek Reservoir, Dexter, and Hampton. In Oregon this includes State Highway 58 between mile markers 11 and 40. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Cascade Foothills in Lane County; Cascades in Lane County
